author: Maeve McDermott
description: Perry shared new song 'Swish Swish,' which also features Nicki Minaj, at midnight Friday.
title: Katy Perry's 'Swish Swish' angers Taylor Swift pal Ruby Rose

author: MESFIN FEKADU
description: Hello, Drake has surpassed Adele's record at the 2017 Billboard Music Awards on Sunday, picking up 13 awards. Adele set a record at the show in 2012 with 12 wins. The rapper, who walked into the show Sunday with 22 nominations, won top artist, top male artist and top Billboard 200 album ("Views"), among others, at the T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. "I got my whole family up here," said Drake, who stood onstage with nearly two dozen people, including his father, Lil Wayne and Nicki Minaj.
title: Hello! Drake breaks Adele's record at Billboard Music Awards
